}} [[File:Univerzitet dzemal bijedic u mostar.jpg|thumb|left|The University DÅ¾emal BijediÄ of Mostar]] '''Faculty of Business Management''' [[University "DÅ¾emal BijediÄ" of Mostar]] located.[http://www.fpm.ba/bos/stream.php?kat=17 UNMO;FPM ] This Faculty organizes two-year and four-year undergraduate studies, as well as postgraduate studies. After completion of two-year studies, a student gets a diploma of an economist manager, and after four-year studies of a graduate economist manager.
